name: Ideal Hero: Furry Visual Novel
description:
Synopsis: A brave hero (you), is wandering through a fantasy world, with the aim of creating a guild, recruiting various potential warriors.  His great goal is to spread his "Hero's Ideal" around the world, helping people in need.  Could it be that in the midst of so many adventures, maybe there is some time for love?  Only time will tell...

ALERT: This game is in production.  The second version will be released soon.

ALERT 2: English is not my native language, any grammatical errors you may have in the comments or on my Twitter, grammatical errors will be fixed as soon as possible.
